## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass (`pytest tests/`)
- [ ] Python formatted (`black app/ tests/ run.py --line-length 100`)
- [ ] Frontend formatted (`npx prettier --write "*.jsx" "components/*.jsx"`)
- [ ] Frontend builds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] No new secrets or credentials committed
- [ ] README/CONTRIBUTING updated (if applicable)
